content: c work until all main body stitches are consumed purl one row row 1 p2 ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog p3 ssk k2 more and bind off remaining stitches weave in yo k1 k2tog with edge stitch ends and block row 2 and all even-­ numbered ws row to row 12 slip first stitch purlwise purl all remaining stitches 2 © copyright 2013 michelle miller all rights reserved to contact michelle please email fickleknitterdesign@yahoo com or visit http //www shop fickleknitter com baah blue iris by michelle miller 2013 note for chart a all wrong side row are purled work chart a increases with a yo on each edge and on each side of the center st until there are 25 sts then begin chart b note for chart b the main body pattern repeat is indicated by the red-­ bordered sections on chart b work the red bordered instructions once through row 22 twice through row 22 on the second repeat three times through row 22 on the third repeat four times through row 22 on the fourth repeat and so on while working chart b eight times ending with row 22 and there are 185 stitches then work the knit on edging found in chart c all wrong side row are purled note for chart c using the knitted cast-­ on method cast on 20 sts work chart c knitting last edge stitch together with one stitch from main body stitches on all odd row repeat chart c until one stitch to the right of stitch marker is reached ending with a purl row and then complete the short row center written instructions purl all ws row slipping the first stitch 3 © copyright 2013 michelle miller all rights reserved to contact michelle please email fickleknitterdesign@yahoo com or visit http //www shop fickleknitter com
